greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the function F(x) evaluated at the constant x that satisfies: F(x) - x*F'(x) = 0, where F(x) = Sum_{n>=0} x^(n*(n+1)/2).
comment: Constant A106333 divided by this constant equals constant A106335, the radius of convergence of the g.f. of A106336.
mathematica: digits = 105; x0 = x /. FindRoot[ Sum[(1 - n*(n+1)/2)*x^(n*(n+1)/2), {n, 0, digits}], {x, 1/2}, WorkingPrecision -> digits+5]; f[x_] := EllipticTheta[2, 0, Sqrt[x]]/(2*x^(1/8)); f[x0] // RealDigits[#, 10, digits]& // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 05 2013 *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Apr 29 2005
